Package Lubomski_WGU_C195.helper

Class Utility

java.lang.Object
Lubomski_WGU_C195.helper.Utility
public class Utility extends Object
Provides utility methods for logging, alerts, and navigation.

  • Method Details

    • loginActivityLogger

      public static void loginActivityLogger(String username, boolean loginStatus)
      Logs login activity to a file. Writes the login attempt details including username, time, and status to a log file.
      Parameters:
      username - The username used for login.
      loginStatus - The status of the login attempt (true if successful, false otherwise).

    • sendAlertBox

      public static void sendAlertBox(String alertTitle, String alertMessage)
      Displays an alert box with a warning message.
      Parameters:
      alertTitle - The title of the alert box.
      alertMessage - The message to be displayed in the alert box.

    • sendConfirmationAlert

      public static Optional<javafx.scene.control.ButtonType> sendConfirmationAlert(String title, String message)
      Displays a confirmation alert and returns the user's choice.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the confirmation alert.
      message - The message to be displayed in the confirmation alert.
      Returns:
      An Optional ButtonType chosen by the user.

    • navigateNewScene

      public static void navigateNewScene(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, String fxmlFilePath, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Navigates to a new scene. Loads and displays the FXML view from the file path.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event that triggers the navigation.
      fxmlFilePath - The file path of the FXML view to load.
      resourceBundle - The resource bundle to use for localization.

    • exitApplication

      public static void exitApplication(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Closes the application. Closes the database connection and exits the application.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event that triggers the exit.

    • navigateToUpdateScene

      public static void navigateToUpdateScene(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, String fxmlPath, Appointment appointment, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Navigates to the update appointment scene. Loads and displays the update appointment view with the selected appointment's data.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event that triggers the navigation.
      fxmlPath - The file path of the FXML view to load.
      appointment - The appointment to be updated.
      resourceBundle - The resource bundle to use for localization.

    • navigateToCustomerUpdateScene

      public static void navigateToCustomerUpdateScene(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, String fxmlPath, Customer customer, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Navigates to the update customer scene. Loads and displays the update customer view with the selected customer's data.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event that triggers the navigation.
      fxmlPath - The file path of the FXML view to load.
      customer - The customer to be updated.
      resourceBundle - The resource bundle to use for localization.
